remarks: A magma homomorphism preserves the binary operation.  (Contributed by AV, 25-Feb-2020.)
statement:
mgmhmlin.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
mgmhmlin.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` S ) $.
mgmhmlin.q $e |- .+^ = ( +g ` T ) $.
mgmhmlin $p |- ( ( F e. ( S MgmHom T ) /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( F ` ( X .+ Y ) ) = ( ( F ` X ) .+^ ( F ` Y ) ) ) $.
